title: Ep. 2869 - A Hungry Dog - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 25 November 2019
shortDesc: Jethalal gets his father and is returning home when they stop by to get some food. They are chased down by a dog until the society by a hungry dog. The dog even pulls on Champaklal's Dhoti. Stay tuned.

title: Ep. 2870 - Cool Dude Eye Patch - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 26 November 2019
shortDesc: Jethalal's father is unable to do even the most basic chores. But soon, Atif brings eye drops and along with it a 'Cool Dude' eye patch to help Jethalal's father. What new troubles will this 'Cool Dude' eye patch bring?

title: Ep. 2871 - Bhide's Promise To Jethalal - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 27 November 2019
shortDesc: Despite being reluctant to help Jethalal take care of his father in his absence, Bhide is forced to take up the responsibility when Jethalal's father talks to him on the phone. Will Bhide go as promised or will he find a way out of this problem?

title: Ep. 2872 - The Tea Powder Revelation  - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 28 November 2019
shortDesc: Popatlal visits Jethalal's father to take care of him for a while. When Popatlal offers to make tea for the three of them, he realizes that they are out of tea powder. Jethalal's father asks them to call him on the phone and find out where it is. But

title: Ep. 2873 - Bhide Is Stuck - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 29 November 2019
shortDesc: When Jethalal's father says that he's feeling uncomfortable because of not being able to read the newspaper, Popatlal offers to read news using a news app on his phone. But soon after, Popatlal receives a work call from his boss.

title: Ep. 2874 - Frauds At The Specs Shop - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 2 December 2019
shortDesc: Jethalal leaves his shop early to pick up his father's spectacles that he had dropped for repairing. He realizes that the shop he dropped the specs at a fraud store. Jethalal goes back to Chimanlal's shop and gives the specs for repairing.

title: Ep. 2875 - Bhide's Sakharam Is Stolen - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 3 December 2019
shortDesc: Bhide is trying to take Champaklal to one of his friend's birthday. He is getting stuck because everyone is wanting to not let Champaklal leave without his specs. But only Bhide knows the compulsion for his situation. Stay tuned.

title: Ep. 2876 - Chachaji Is Kidnapped - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 4 December 2019
shortDesc: Champak Chacha is kidnapped as the thief steals Sakharam and tries to escape. There is police checking in most of the places hence the thief tries to leave the scooter and steal Chachaji's gold chain. Chachaji defends himself and the thief runs away.

title: Ep. 2877 - Jethalal Is Angry With Bhide - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 5 December 2019
shortDesc: Bhide is finding Chachaji and the scooter while Chachaji is trying to find someone who can drop him and the scooter home. Later a drunk man appears and says he will help Chachaji in reaching the destination but he tends to be drunk and roams around.

title: Ep. 2878 - Chalu Pandey Joins The Dots - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 6 December 2019
shortDesc: Chachaji is taken to a bar by a drunkard and he almost drinks alcohol instead of juice. On the other hand, Bhide comes to the police station to file a complaint. Chalu Pandey files the report and starts to learn the small details about the case.

title: Ep. 2879 - Wrong Destination - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 9 December 2019
shortDesc: Chalu Pandey and the others are doing their utmost to find back Champak Chacha. On the other hand, Chachaji crosses ways with a couple of kids who use him to earn money. At last, Chachaji gets onto a bus that goes to a wrong destination. Stay tuned.

title: Ep. 2880 - Another Day Of Worries - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 10 December 2019
shortDesc: Jethalal and the others don't get any news about his father. Chachaji is on the wrong bus and doesn't have money for his ticket. On the other hand, a boy comes and helps him with the ticket and also offers him chocolate.

title: Ep. 2881 - Jethalal Pressures The Police - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 11 December 2019
shortDesc: Jethalal keeps pressuring the police and sits in the police station until his father is found, on the other hand Chachaji who was in a bus which would reach Gokuldham, got missed and is struggling to get back home. Stay tuned.

title: Ep. 2882 - Pandeyji Is Determined - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 12 December 2019
shortDesc: All the members of Gokuldham are in the police station and they demand to find out Champaklal but Inspector Pandey manages to send them back to their society. Pandey Ji is determined to find Jethalal's father.

title: Ep. 2883 - Chachaji's Homecoming - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 13 December 2019
shortDesc: Everyone in Gokuldham is chanting to god. Meanwhile, Chachaji gets into a strange society making a scene due to his Night blindness and meets Sathish who help Chachaji dial to Jethalal. Receiving a call from Chachaji everyone celebrates.
